data.title: 3018 Gayle Dr, Garland, TX 75044
data.meta_description: Zillow has 24 photos of this $418,000 3 beds, 2 baths, 1,999 Square Feet single family home located at 3018 Gayle Dr, Garland, TX 75044 built in 1974. MLS #20679117.
data.text: Price Reduced! Beautiful completely updated home, near major freeways, shopping and entertainment. Large open floorplan, walk into formal living and dining, beyond that you find a gorgeous kitchen with quartz counters, new cabinets, new stainless appliances and large island open to the family room. The huge family room has a wood burning fireplace and looks out to the covered patio. Large primary retreat with gorgeous updated bath, oversized shower, frameless glass and furniture vanity. 2 other nice sized bedrooms with updated bath in hallway. 2 car rear entry garage, large fenced backyard with covered patio. Home has new roof, new fixtures, new flooring, fresh paint and more. Every inch of this home has been redone. Don't miss this one!
